CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Member_Location_TZ_Offset__c),"", IF( OR( VALUE( LEFT( TEXT( TIMEVALUE(NOW() - (VALUE(MID(Member_Location_TZ_Offset__c,5,IF(LEN(Member_Location_TZ_Offset__c)=8,1,2)))/24)) ), 2 ) ) = 0, VALUE( LEFT( TEXT( TIMEVALUE(NOW() - (VALUE(MID(Member_Location_TZ_Offset__c,5,IF(LEN(Member_Location_TZ_Offset__c)=8,1,2)))/24)) ), 2 ) ) = 12 ), "12", TEXT( VALUE( LEFT( TEXT( TIMEVALUE(NOW() - (VALUE(MID(Member_Location_TZ_Offset__c,5,IF(LEN(Member_Location_TZ_Offset__c)=8,1,2)))/24)) ), 2 ) ) - IF( VALUE( LEFT( TEXT( TIMEVALUE(NOW() - (VALUE(MID(Member_Location_TZ_Offset__c,5,IF(LEN(Member_Location_TZ_Offset__c)=8,1,2)))/24)) ), 2 ) ) < 12, 0, 12 ) ) ) & ":" & MID( TEXT( TIMEVALUE(NOW() - (VALUE(MID(Member_Location_TZ_Offset__c,5,IF(LEN(Member_Location_TZ_Offset__c)=8,1,2)))/24)) ), 4, 2 ) & " " & IF( VALUE( LEFT( TEXT( TIMEVALUE(NOW() - (VALUE(MID(Member_Location_TZ_Offset__c,5,IF(LEN(Member_Location_TZ_Offset__c)=8,1,2)))/24)) ), 2 ) ) < 12, "AM", "PM" ) )
